name: WiFi Ad-hoc Manager
short_description:
WAHM was created out of my need to easily create and manage a WiFi ad-hoc connection on my Windows 8 desktop, without having to resort to the command line utility every time that I reboot.

It is a GUI front-end for the netsh application that ships with Windows.

It was created in VB.net.

Here on SF, I have only added the source code. You are free to download it and modify it as you see fit. Compile it, fork it, keep it free, sell your own version, use your own icons and artwork, you get my drift.

*Do note that the icons used in my version is free to use in a free application, and can be downloaded from the creator at:  http://icons8.com/download-hugewindows8-set/ - you will have to pay them if you want to use it in a commercial version of the software.

To download the full application, get it here: http://www.softpedia.com/get/Network-Tools/Misc-Networking-Tools/WiFi-Ad-hoc-Manager.shtml
summary: Creates and edits your WiFi ad-hoc connection.
